Title: Bad Little Boy
Writer: Pendleton Ward (creator), Cole Sanchez, Rebecca Sugar, Patrick McHale (story), Adam Muto (story), Kent Osborne (story), Rebecca Sugar (story), Pendleton Ward (story)
Actors: Tom Kenny, Olivia Olson, Madeleine Martin, Neil Patrick Harris
Plot: A return to the gender-swapped world with Fionna and Cake and Marshall Lee the Vampire King.
